name: steam_carpet_cleaning
description: Steam Carpet Cleaning Company in Seattle

scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o assets/css/style.min.css assets/css/style.css && cleancss -o assets/css/fontawesome.min.css assets/css/fontawesome.css
scripts.minify:js: terser script.js -o script.min.js && terser isotope.min.js -o isotope.min.js
scripts.optimize:all: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js

author: Steam Carpet Cleaning
